#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);

    int a[1000] = {0};
    int i =0, k=0;

    while (k <=n) {
        i +=k;
        while (i >=n) i -=n;
        a[i]++;
        k++;
    }

    int flag =1;
    for (int j=0; j <n; j++) {
        if (a[j] ==0) {
            flag =0;
            break;
        }
    }

    char first_output[5]; // "YES" is 4 chars including null, "NO" is 3
    if (flag) {
        strcpy(first_output, "YES");
    } else {
        strcpy(first_output, "NO");
    }

    // Now process first_output through second's logic.

    int len = strlen(first_output);
    char a_str[len+1];
    char b_str[len+1];
    strcpy(a_str, first_output);
    strcpy(b_str, first_output);

    int a1=0, a2=0;

    // Process a_str for a1
    for (int i=1; i < len; i++) {
        if (a_str[i] == a_str[i-1]) {
            if (a_str[i] == '1') a_str[i] = '0';
            else a_str[i] = '1';
            a1++;
        }
    }

    // Process b_str for a2
    for (int i = len-1; i>0; i--) {
        if (b_str[i] == b_str[i-1]) {
            if (b_str[i-1] == '1') b_str[i-1] = '0';
            else b_str[i-1] = '1';
            a2++;
        }
    }

    printf("%d\n", (a1 < a2) ? a1 : a2);

    return 0;
}
